item.title: Scala Local Toggle
item.description: feature toggle by configuration file for scala applications Install //Use version in badge libraryDependencies += "com.github.kanekotic" %% "scala-local-toggle" % <version> Use Instantiate can be done by newing the class, it can also be register in guice or dependency injection frameworks. val toggle = new ToggleManager(); use default files for loading configuration, it will try to load toggles from the following (first-listed are higher priority):
